Get Error Message
Main Success Scenario:
  1. Error response has "error" and "error_description" names like below
  
    {
      "error":"invalid_grant",
      "error_description":"Invalid Username or Password"
    }

Get Bad Tenant URL Error Message
Main Success Scenario:
  1. xxx:fill in
  
Get Bad Credentials Error Message
Main Success Scenario:
  1. xxx:fill in
  
Get Invalid Token Error Message
Main Success Scenario:
  1. See below JSON
      {
          "error": "invalid_token",
          "error_description": "Token is invalid: GUID here"
      }
